com.adNomus.library

Class StandardAd

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adNomus.library.AdNomusAd
      • com.adNomus.library.StandardAd

  • public class StandardAd
extends AdNomusAd
    This is part of the AdNomus SDK for Android. This class provides the methods that are necessary for contracting a native ad.
